title: Penguins remain winless after home opener loss to Canadiens, 3-2
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Penguins - Today 
The Penguins lost their third consecutive game to start the season following a 3-2 loss to the Montreal Canadiens at Consol Energy Center to...
